nested_items.name: targetResource
nested_items.description: The resource the action will be taken on.

nested_items.name: assetId
nested_items.description: The ID of the asset, in UUID format.

nested_items.name: actionDefinitionId
nested_items.description: The ID of the action definition.

nested_items.name: actionPayload
nested_items.description: The JSON payload of the action.

nested_items.name: stringValue
nested_items.description: The payload of the action in a JSON string.

nested_items.name: executionTime
nested_items.description: The time the action was executed.
